text:
My daughter joined Agape Thomson in Dec 2020 just before N1. She is now in K2 about to graduate in Nov. Agape Thomson has been excellent. I feel safe having my daughter in this preschool, we love the teachers and staff as they are trustworthy, nurturing and great in communication as well.

The preschool has an app for us to monitor the check in/check out time, and there are also updates shared by the teachers as well as term reports. My daughter loves going to school everyday ü©∑ There are also some enrichment programs available at an additional fee, such as Chinese Speech & Drama, Music and Science classes (the programs might vary yearly).
Came for a school tour & Ally was very friendly and welcoming! Very helpful and mananged to answered all our questions. Very impressed with the classrooms decor and indoor playground!
Ally gave us a very informative tour and answered our queries enthusiastically. She is easy to talk to and gave us full confidence to enrol our LO here in future. Looking forward üëçüèª
Thanks Elly for touring me around the school. I like the atmosphere there and I think the kids are enjoying their classes. Hopefully my girl get a slot here !

Ally was incredibly helpful through the entire process from enquiry to site visit.

This has been quite a stark contrast to the attitudes of other centres and even other branches.
